Posts.EditableText: Hello everyone. I just finished my first game "Soporification", but it only shows the _last_ entry possible. Any ideas as what is going on or what to do?
Posts.HTML: Hello everyone. I just finished my first game "Soporification", but it only shows the last entry possible. Any ideas as what is going on or what to do?

Posts.EditableText:
Do you mean it starts your game at the end?

1. Do you have an @start lines that you forgot to delete while you were testing?

2. Did you use an @start line to tell Squiffy where you want to start the game?
Posts.HTML:
Do you mean it starts your game at the end?
